§5The Lucky Horseshoe§r is a trinket that brings good fortune to its bearer. It might negate some fall damage.

There is a total of §a4 tiers§r of Lucky Horseshoes, each providing increased benefits. Upgrade your horseshoe to enhance its luck!

To upgrade/downgrade a §bLucky Horseshoe§r, arrange §a8 Emeralds§r, §a8 Diamonds§r or §a8 Netherite Ingots§r around a §bLucky Horseshoe§r in a crafting table.

Every tier can be upgraded to every other tier using the same recipe. The material used determines the tier of the resulting horseshoe.
